main_definition: Dentists are healthcare professionals who specialize in the diagnosis, prevention, and treatment of conditions that affect the teeth, gums, and mouth.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A group or organization related to dentistry
meanings_and_examples.example: The National Dentists Association (NDA) is a national body representing all registered dentists in the country.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To cause minor damage, especially as an effect of forceful contact or impact
meanings_and_examples.example: When I accidentally bit into the hard candy, it dents my front tooth slightly.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A metaphorical reference used in informal language to describe someone's negative impact on a situation or relationship
meanings_and_examples.example: After his harsh criticism of our project during the meeting, he really dented the team morale.
